org.fishwife.jrugged

Class PerformanceMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fishwife.jrugged.PerformanceMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceWrapper

    public class PerformanceMonitor
extends Object
implements ServiceWrapper
    The PerformanceMonitor is a convenience wrapper for gathering a slew of useful operational metrics about a service, including moving averages for latency and request rate over various time windows (last minute, last hour, last day). The intended use is for a client to use the "Decorator" design pattern that decorates an existing service with this wrapper. Portions of this object can then be exposed via JMX, for example to allow for operational polling.
